snippet: Civilian casualties have soared as separatist rebels with heavy artillery attack the airport in Donetsk and Ukrainian forces respond with often ill-directed fire.
abstract: Civilian casualties have soared as separatist rebels attack airport in Donetsk and Ukrainian forces respond with often ill-directed fire; recent rocket attack hit elementary school, killing a teacher and a parent.
lead_paragraph: Civilian casualties have soared as separatist rebels with heavy artillery attack the airport in Donetsk and Ukrainian forces respond with often ill-directed fire.
